Collision - class edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.Collision.
The Collision class provides methods to check for a collision between the robot and an object in the simulated environment.
Collision(CurrentRobotState, int[][], Vector) - Constructor for class edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.Collision
Allocates a new Collision object that will detect collisions in the current simulator environment.
controller - Variable in class edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.KSReadWriteHeader
Name of the currently active controller.
Controller - interface edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.Controller.
The Controller interface should be implemented by any class whose instances are intended to be executed by a thread and perform real-time manipulation of an object.
controllerName - Variable in class edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.KSServer
 
createWorldImage() - Method in class edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.WorldDrawManager
Sets values in the 500 x 500 world image matrix to appropriate values based on the presence and position of user placed objects (and the static outer walls).
